Episodes.Title: IX.
Episodes.Plot: The Walrus crew is stranded, with an army of Spanish soldiers standing between them and the precious Urca gold. With their crimes against their brethren no longer a secret, Flint and Silver must join forces in a desperate bid for survival.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: X.
Episodes.Plot: Flint gives Dufresne some advice. Silver must make himself indispensable. Eleanor is asked to depose a captain. Rackham gets ambitious.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Graphic violence, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: XI.
Episodes.Plot: Flint returns to Nassau and encounters a dilemma; Eleanor turns to an unlikely source for help; Rackham works to restore his reputation; Vane gets an unexpected prize.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: XII.
Episodes.Plot: Flint threatens Vane. Eleanor chooses a side. Rackham learns what Max is capable of. Silver reunites with an old friend.

Episodes.Title: XIII.
Episodes.Plot: Miranda embarks on a journey to save the island. Eleanor opens old wounds. Rackham sniffs around a big secret. Vane must take matters into his own hands.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: XIV.
Episodes.Plot: Eleanor brokers a peace. Rackham learns the hard way. Flint breaks a promise. Bonny loses control.

Episodes.Title: XV.
Episodes.Plot: Max cleans up after a massacre. News from the outside world changes everything for Flint and Silver. Eleanor risks her life for the sake of her future. Bonny faces a crossroads. Dufresne pushes Billy to act.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: XVI.
Episodes.Plot: Flint and Miranda prepare for the worst. Silver has his eyes opened. Eleanor discovers Max's secret. Vane makes his move.

Episodes.Title: XVII.
Episodes.Plot: Flint and Miranda come to grips with their past. Bonny makes clear her intentions to Rackham. Vane collects a huge prize. Eleanor issues a declaration of war.

Episodes.Title: XVIII.
Episodes.Plot: Flint acquires an unlikely ally. Vane's crew seeks a sea change. Silver makes a sacrifice.
